title: South Korea's Lee says plans record $25 billion govt spending on research in 2026
description: SEOUL (Reuters) -South Korean President Lee Jae Myung said on Friday the government planned to boost research spending by nearly a fifth to a record 35.3 trillion won ($25.23 billion) in 2026 to help drive the development of artificial intelligence technologies. In televised remarks, Lee said South Korea had managed to transform into an industrial powerhouse through investing in the years since Japanese colonial rule ended in 1945. South Korea is "the only country in the world that was liberated from a colony and succeeded in both industrialisation and democratisation, and that was because we invested in the future," Lee said.

title: Australia may have made an AI policy 'breakthrough', but how does it compare globally?
description: Artificial intelligence could deliver major gains for Australia's economy, but an expert warns the benefits may be uneven and governance risks are mounting without a clear national strategy.
content:
Treasurer Jim Chalmers doubled down on a promise this week to conduct another review into artificial intelligence (AI) regulation, to determine whether the technology needs new laws or can fit into existing ones.

title: Meta Signs $10 Billion Google Cloud Computing Deal Amid AI Race
description: Meta Platforms Inc. has agreed to a deal worth at least $10 billion with Alphabet Inc.’s Google for cloud computing services, according to people familiar with the matter, part of the social media giant’s spending spree on artificial intelligence.
content:

title: White Peak launches MaximizeOS to help businesses win in the AI era.
description: MaximizeOS™ is a fully managed ROI operating system from White Peak Marketing that transforms every click into a customer and every customer into a loyal advocate-without adding to your workload. Learn more: https://whitepeak.io/Reno, Nevada, Aug. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- White Peak Marketing today launched MaximizeOS™, a fully managed marketing service built to help businesses thrive as artificial intelligence transforms how customers search and buy online. With organic search engine traffic disappearing and paid channels becoming increasingly expensive, many marketers are struggling to protect revenue and growth.

title: Zoom Communications lifts annual forecasts on robust demand for AI tools
